sentences.english: Hainan " uncompleted residential flats" instead of live?
Big office buildings and apartment complexes sit half-finished.
sentences.chinese: 大的办公楼和公寓群都成了烂尾楼。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, uncompleted residential flats often in the form of auction.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，烂尾楼常常会以拍卖的方式进行处理。

sentences.english: Beijing " uncompleted residential flats" about millions of square metres.
sentences.chinese: 北京的“烂尾楼”大约有几百万平方米。

sentences.english: They launched a fund drive on all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 发起成立中国烂尾楼基金联盟一直以来是我的梦想。

sentences.english: Local governments are faced with bad loans and failing projects.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府正面对着大量坏账和烂尾项目。

sentences.english: 'We don't want there to be half-finished buildings around the community, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“我们不希望这里变得到处都是烂尾楼。”

sentences.english: The famous company purchased several unfinished building projects last month.
sentences.chinese: 那家知名的公司上个月收购了好几个烂尾楼项目。
